EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

params._configAddress: The address of the CarbonCoinConfig contract.
params._paymasterAddress: The address of the CarbonCoinPaymaster contract.
params._protectionAddress: The address of the CarbonCoinProtection contract.
params._usdcAddress: The address of the USDC token.

params.creatorAddress: The address of the creator of the token.
params.curveConfig: The bonding curve configuration for the token.
params.name: The name of the token.

returns._0: The address of the newly created token.

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to mark as graduated.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._max: The new maximum number of tokens.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

configAddress().notice: The address of the CarbonCoinConfig contract, which provides default configurations for new tokens.

constructor.notice: The constructor for the CarbonCoinLauncher contract.

markTokenGraduated(address).notice: Marks a token as graduated. This can be called by the token contract itself or by the owner of the launcher contract.

maxTokensPerCreator().notice: The maximum number of tokens that a single address can create.

pause().notice: Pauses the contract, which prevents new tokens from being created.

paymasterAddress().notice: The address of the CarbonCoinPaymaster contract.

protectionAddress().notice: The address of the CarbonCoinProtection contract for initializing new tokens with protection features.

setMaxTokensPerCreator(uint256).notice: Sets the maximum number of tokens that a single address can create.

tokens(address).notice: A mapping from a token address to its TokenInfo struct.

tokensCreatedByAddress(address).notice: A mapping from a creator's address to the number of tokens they have created.

totalTokensCreated().notice: The total number of tokens that have been created.

unpause().notice: Unpauses the contract, which allows new tokens to be created again.

usdcAddress().notice: The address of the USDC token for payments.

withdrawUsdcFees().notice: Withdraws the fees that have been collected from token creations.

userdoc.notice: This contract is responsible for creating and managing CarbonCoin tokens. It allows users to create their own tokens for a fee, and it keeps track of all the tokens created. The owner of the contract can manage the creation fee, the maximum number of tokens per creator, and can pause or unpause the contract. The contract also includes functions for withdrawing fees and transferring ownership.
